title: What I Aspire to Do
text: My goal as a software engineer is to build meaningful performant applications that can make a positive impact and improve lives.

title: What I'm Currently Doing
text: I am pursuing my Master's degree in Computer Science at Arizona State University, where I am also working as a Student Mobile Developer at the University Technology Office.
I recently attended HP's Summer Scholars Program and took part in their Bot-A-Thon competiton in which my team placed 2nd out 21 teams.
In my free time, I take different online courses to expand my knowledge and improve my skillset as an engineer.

title: When I'm not coding, I'm
text: Playing Football | Watching Anime | Reading | Listening to Music | Exercising | Learning New Languages
